entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
